about_the_game:
room rpg is an action-packed turn-based RPG incorporating both skill based mechanics and in-depth RPG strategy, featuring high octane bullet battles and skill customization allowing you to perfect your build for whatever situation may come and for whatever dastardly, strange foe you must pummel. Starring Michael Softwindows, the worst baseball player at his middle school, a complete failure on a quest for redemption. He would really rather go back to sleep, but with his trusty talking baseball bat anything is possible. Including even more debilitating failure.

Featuring...

  • Turn-based battles with a twist! Defend against bullet-hell lite enemy attacks inspired by the UNDERTALE series, and dish out your own skill-based spells and tactics similar to the Mario & Luigi and Paper Mario series to get the upper hand!
  • Gain extra turns by exploiting enemy weaknesses and strike them out of existence!
  • Customize skills by equipping different pins, allowing you to have a unique set of skills perfect for whatever combat scenario you're in!
  • A very silly story about anything but actually playing baseball!
  • One entire boy's room to explore!
  • Inspiration from Earthbound with themes of SOMETHING or ANOTHER...!

Minimum:

short_description: Experience THE action-packed turn-based RPG incorporating timing and skill based battle mechanics, where you dodge bullets and complete small challenges to boost your spells. Equip pins to customize your skill loadouts, and exploit your foes weakness to gain extra turns.
